title: Zengo & Co Attend 2 Day Retreat in New York City
text: Email This Story Printer Friendly PDF Version RSS Feed Zengo & Co Attend 2 Day Retreat in New York City After an exceptional 2015 so far, sales and marketing firm Zengo & Co recently attended a 2-day retreat to New York City, where they met with industry professionals and took in some of the sights of America's most vibrant city. CHICAGO, IL, August 29,   Chicago based sales and event marketing firm Zengo & Co have had anything but a quiet 2015. As well as taking home some of the biggest awards at the National Sales and Marketing Awards in Baltimore last month, the firm has also launched 2 major recruitment drives to support their substantial growth and development. With so many exciting achievements to their name, Zengo & Co recently took some time away from the office to embark on a 2-day retreat to New York City with some of their leading representatives. The trip offered Zengo & Co the chance to experience America's most vibrant city, both in terms of culture and business. The first day of the 2-day retreat saw the firm visit the offices of some of New York's leading industry professionals. As well as offering Zengo & Co the opportunity to network and build strong business connections within the city, the trip also gave the firm an insight into how their industry operates in different markets, and how the demands of the New York market differs to that of Chicago. To make the most of this valuable learning opportunity Zengo & Co invited two of their top leaders Jorge and Natalie to join them on the trip and meet with fellow professionals in New York. About Zengo & Co: About Zengo & Co: http://www.zengoandco.com/about-us/ Zengo & Co believe it's incredibly important to socialise with clients and business partners outside of the office, as it allows each party to share ideas and discuss strategies without the day-to-day distractions of business. It also helps to spark more creative thinking and offers participants a new and more stimulating environment which can help them to take on new perspectives and opens up the possibility for exciting collaborations. The second day of the trip presented the firm with the chance to take in some of New York's culture and experience some of the city's best loved and world famous attractions. This included a luxury yacht retreat which took the firm along the Hudson River and past some of New York's most iconic landmarks, such as the Statue of Liberty, the Empire State Building and the Brooklyn Bridge. Zengo & Co is a Chicago based sales and event marketing firm that specialize in bridging the gap between brands and their consumers through face-to-face communication. The firm believe that in order to improve sales and boost customer loyalty brands must make an effort to properly engage with their consumers and personalize the customer experience. On behalf of their clients, the firm design and implement face-to-face marketing campaigns that allow them to deliver a unique service to each customer they meet, which dramatically improves their clients customer retention rates and ROIZengo & Co. specializes in a personalized form of direct marketing in order to generate quality leads and deliver a high ROI to their clients.
